alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Lower Yukon Valley; Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 19 at 2:54PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Wintry Mix and Warming Temperatures for the Yukon Delta, Lower Yukon, and eastern Norton Sound Sunday through Monday... Expect a mix of snow, blowing snow, and rain showers across the Yukon Delta, Lower Yukon, and eastern Norton Sound beginning Sunday. The associated warm front will bring snow and easterly winds Sunday morning, with a quick 1-2" of snowfall. Expect blowing and drifting snow, especially along and near the coast, where easterly winds will increase to 15 to 30 mph gusting to 40 mph. Sunday afternoon and evening, temps will begin to warm into the 30s with southeast winds increasing to 25 to 40 mph, with gusts as high as 50 mph along the coast. Expect periods of rain and snow showers to continue through Monday. Residents should take necessary precautions and prepare for poor traveling conditions. For the latest forecast go to weather.gov/fairbanks.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Lower Yukon Valley; Yukon Delta
